DESCRIPTION: Reshuffle cards are shuffled into your draw pile after you play them.
Spectral cards are exhausted when played or at the start of your turn.
Resonance deals damage to ALL enemies at the end of your turn. Whenever you take damage, Resonance is reduced by half.
When you Reveal a card it is taken from the top of your draw pile, acted on, and then discarded.
Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
